Package eu.opends.environment

  • Class Summary
    Class Description
    Crosswind  
    GeoPosition
    This class contains methods to convert model coordinates to geo coordinates and vice versa.
    LaneLimit  
    TrafficLight
    This class represents a single traffic light which can be switched between different states.
    TrafficLightCenter
    This class represents the management of all traffic lights within a model.
    TrafficLightExternalConnector
    This class connects to an external traffic light program via an UDP socket.
    TrafficLightForecast  
    TrafficLightInternalProgram
    This class represents the internal traffic light program.
    TrafficLightPhase
    This class represents a traffic light phase.
    TrafficLightPositionData
    This class provides information of a traffic light about the positioning at an intersection.
    XMLParser
    XMLParser allows XML parsing of strings and files in order to evaluate traffic light instructions either manually generated or by the external SUMO traffic simulator.
  • Enum Summary
    Enum Description
    TrafficLight.TrafficLightDirection
    TrafficLightDirection indicates whether the the traffic light has arrow-shaped lights and to which direction they are pointing.
    TrafficLight.TrafficLightState
    TrafficLightState indicates the combination of illuminated lights.
    TrafficLightCenter.TrafficLightMode
    TrafficLightMode indicates which traffic light program is applied for all intersections.
    TrafficLightCenter.TriggerType
